title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions.
While the pasta is cooking, fry the pancetta in a pan until crisp.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cheeses together.
Drain the pasta, reserving some of the cooking water.
Quickly mix the hot pasta with the pancetta, then add the egg and cheese mixture, stirring quickly to create a creamy sauce. Add a little pasta water if needed.
Serve immediately with lots of freshly ground black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pan, heat the butter and add the tomato puree.
Simmer for 5 minutes, then stir in the heavy cream.
Add the cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for another 10 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Classic Beef Burgers
summary: Juicy, homemade beef burgers that are perfect for any occasion. Simple to make and delicious.
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, cheese, and other toppings
instructions: In a bowl, mix the ground beef, onion, and egg.
Form into 4 patties.
Grill or pan-fry the patties for 4-5 minutes on each side.
Serve on buns with your favorite toppings.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy vegetable stir-fry with a savory sauce. Perfect for a weeknight dinner.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers)
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, honey, and sesame oil.
Heat a large pan or wok over medium-high heat. Add a little oil.
Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add the vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and cook for another minute until the sauce has thickened slightly.
Serve immediately.
